
# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Virtual environment folders
venv/
env/
.venv/
ENV/

# System files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Log and temporary files
*.log
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp

# Excel / CSV raw or intermediate data files (too large for Git)
*.csv
*.xlsx
*.xls
*.ods

# Power BI or Excel reports (not needed in repo)
*.pbix
*.xlsm

# Output or result files
outputs/
reports/
plots/
figures/

# VS Code and IDE settings
.vscode/
.idea/

# Compiled or generated files
*.zip
*.tar
*.gz
*.rar

# Environment variables or secrets
.env
*.json
config.yaml

# Cache files
__pycache__/
*.ipynb_checkpoints
.cache/
.pytest_cache/
